FRiP.description: Fraction of all mapped reads that fall into the called peak regions (Fraction of reads in peaks)

mappedReads.description: Number of uniquely mapped PE reads

meanCoverage.description: Total number of bases covered by ATAC-seq reads/size of genome

percentAligned.description: Percent of reads aligned to genome reference

sequencingReplicate.description: Replicates from the same library sequenced multiple times

technicalReplicate.description: Replicates from the same biosample, treated identically

totalReads.description: Number of reads in the input FASTQ file
